# [Interview #1158: OdysseyCon 2016, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1158#40)

#### Blightsong

Can a Parshendi with the right mind set transform with an Unmade?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
